options.optionText: Caught you red-handed, Diana. Or should I say, red-fingered?
options.responseText: Oh, please. If you’re gonna watch me *'polish my pussy'* the least you could do is not suck at jokes.

responseTexts: Go ahead, snitch. Just make sure to tell them how long you stood there watching before you decided to tattle. I’ll be sure to mention how you couldn’t keep your eyes off me.
What the f--?! You little snitch! Go ahead, report me, but don’t act like you weren’t thinking of joining in. Just remember: snitches get... nothing. And I do mean nothing.

followUpOptions.optionText: You’re pretty cocky for someone who just risked a Bonk Baton to the face.
followUpOptions.responseText: Oh, honey, I’ve taken bigger hits in my sleep. You really think those spandex-clad rejects can stop me? I could have them *begging* to let me off the hook in five minutes.

followUpOptions.optionText: If you're gonna break the rules, at least invite me next time.
followUpOptions.responseText: *You*? Oh, sweetheart, you wouldn’t last five seconds in the same room with me. You’d cramp up before we even got started.

followUpOptions.optionText: You sure talk big for someone who just made a mess.
